content: Hmmm, I just checked my Thunderebird version - it's 140.4.0. It's the latest version, AND was automatically installed yesterday, which is exactly when this login problem started happening. So, was this a super coincidence, or was the update the cause of the problem????

content:

Everything is configured correctly, and it used to work fine until this week. The issue suddenly appeared without any changes on my end.

Could you please advise how to fix this connection problem or whether there have been any recent changes to Microsoft or Thunderbirdâ€™s authentication system?
